notesStmt.note: Actual place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Edited by Antonio del Corro. Regarding minor press variants in the imprint see "The Library", XX (1965), p. 191. The Address of the corrector is in the same typesetting as in STC 5789 sq.--Cf. STC.
Many errors in pagination. Actual pagination derived from signature collation.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
